On this page you can apply to be considered for Ubuntu-tn membership by the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~ubuntu-tn-mc|Ubuntu-tn Management Committe]]</nowiki>.

Before applying for membership, please read and carefully follow the <nowiki>[[Membership|membership guidelines]]</nowiki>and <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/TunisianTeam/FreedomFightersGroup | Proc√©dure pour joindre le Froupe FF]]</nowiki> . Your personal wiki page should be prepared '''before''' you add your application to the agenda, so that it can be read beforehand. Come well prepared, otherwise the meetings will take too much time.

The FF membership board meets every first tuesday of the month at 20:00 UTC. The next meeting is scheduled for <nowiki>[[http://www.timeanddate.com/worldclock/fixedtime.html?month=6&day=2&year=2009&hour=20&min=0&sec=0&p1=0|June 2nd 2009, 20:00 UTC]]</nowiki> and and will be held in #ubuntu-tn-meeting on irc.freenode.net.
